titleNullable: ISIC skin disease image dataset labelled
descriptionNullable:
This dataset is to facilitate image classification for 8 skin diseases:
1.  Actinic keratosis
2. Basal cell carcinoma
3. Benign keratosis
4. Dermatofibroma
5. Melanocytic nevus
6. Melanoma
7. Squamous cell carcinoma
8. Vascular lesion

To split the data into train, test and validation sets, you can use https://www.kaggle.com/discussions/general/377415

To split images in the same fashion (from a truth table/ one-hot encoding to labelled folders), you can use https://www.kaggle.com/discussions/general/377410
title: ISIC skin disease image dataset labelled
subtitle: 25,331 images belonging to 8 classes
